name: Dog Boys
description:
There are two kinds of dogs – the tame and the wild. Two players command warring gangs of not so good boys vying for title of top dog in the west.

Enter the doghouse and choose your bad boys through The Dog Pool. You got the cannon shooting chihuahua, the beefy barktender with a tennis ball gun, and the trusty boy with handcannons.

 

Now this town ain’t big enough for the both of y’all. From main street to a quiet ranch, you two need to fight it out to see which gang reigns supreme and which gets sent to a farm upstate.
